mapper.select: select p.name from sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission as rp on p.id = rp.pid LEFT JOIN sys_user_role as ur on ur.rid = rp.rid where ur.uid = #{userId}

select DISTINCT p.id, p.`name`, p.perms from sys_permission as p left join sys_role_permission as rp on p.id = rp.pid left join sys_user_role as ur on ur.rid = rp.rid where 1 = 1 and ur.uid = #{userId} and ur.rid = #{roleId} and p.`name` like CONCAT('%', #{permName}, '%') order by p.id asc order by p.id desc
